thread.title: Review: Tugboat White from Lucas Vineyards is a fun-loving party wine
thread.title_full: Review: Tugboat White from Lucas Vineyards is a fun-loving party wine | syracuse.com

author: Wineforecaster
title: Review: Tugboat White from Lucas Vineyards is a fun-loving party wine
text:
Each week here wine reviewers Leah and David Valvo share their thoughts on Finger Lakes wines.
This week they taste the Tug Boat White from Lucas Vineyards in Interlaken, located on the west side of Cayuga Lake. Here's their summary: "Citrus notes and flavors dominate this budget friendly "good times" wine. Semi-sweet in nature, it would go well with appetizers and grilled salads."
